accordionProps.name: type
accordionProps.description: Determines whether one or multiple items can be opened at the same time.

accordionProps.name: class
accordionProps.description: Additional CSS classes for the accordion container.

accordionItemProps.name: title
accordionItemProps.description: The text displayed in the accordion item header.

accordionItemProps.name: id
accordionItemProps.description: Unique identifier for the item. Auto-generated if not provided.

accordionItemProps.name: class
accordionItemProps.description: Additional CSS classes for the accordion item.

examples.basicCode:
<tolle-accordion>
  <tolle-accordion-item title="Can I open many at once?">
    Yes, because the type is set to multiple by default or explicitly.
  </tolle-accordion-item>
  <tolle-accordion-item title="Is it animated?">
    No, it uses static rendering for a snappy, high-performance feel.
  </tolle-accordion-item>
</tolle-accordion>
examples.multiCode:
<tolle-accordion type="multiple">
  <tolle-accordion-item title="Can I open many at once?">
    Yes, because the type is set to multiple.
  </tolle-accordion-item>
  <tolle-accordion-item title="Is it animated?">
    No, it uses static rendering for a snappy, high-performance feel.
  </tolle-accordion-item>
</tolle-accordion>

examples.playgroundCode:
<tolle-accordion type="${this.playgroundType}">
  <tolle-accordion-item title="Is it accessible?">
    Yes. It adheres to the WAI-ARIA design pattern.
  </tolle-accordion-item>
  <tolle-accordion-item title="Is it styled?">
    Yes. It comes with default styles that match the other components' aesthetic.
  </tolle-accordion-item>
  <tolle-accordion-item title="Is it animated?">
    Yes. It features smooth open/close animations.
  </tolle-accordion-item>
</tolle-accordion>

components.name: AccordionOverviewComponent

alertDialogProps.name: open
alertDialogProps.description: The controlled open state of the dialog.

alertDialogProps.name: openChange
alertDialogProps.description: Event emitted when the open state changes.

contentProps.name: class
contentProps.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the content panel.

examples.playgroundCode:
<!-- Template-driven -->
<tolle-alert-dialog>
  <tolle-alert-dialog-trigger>
    <tolle-button variant="outline">Open Dialog</tolle-button>
  </tolle-alert-dialog-trigger>
  ...
</tolle-alert-dialog>

<!-- Service-based (in your component.ts) -->
open() {
  this.alertDialog.open({
    title: "Are you sure?",
    description: "This is irreversible.",
    variant: "destructive"
  });
}

examples.separatorCode: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BreadcrumbComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/breadcrumb.component'; import { BreadcrumbItemComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/breadcrumb-item.component'; import { BreadcrumbLinkComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/breadcrumb-link.component'; import { BreadcrumbSeparatorComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/breadcrumb-separator.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-custom-separator-breadcrumb', imports: [ BreadcrumbComponent, BreadcrumbItemComponent, BreadcrumbLinkComponent, BreadcrumbSeparatorComponent ], template: ` Home Components Breadcrumb ` }) export class CustomSeparatorBreadcrumbComponent { }

buttonProps.name: variant

examples.basicCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ButtonComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/button.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-basic-button', imports: [ButtonComponent], template: `
Primary (Auto) Secondary (Derived) Outline Ghost Link
Small Default Large
` }) export class BasicButtonComponent { }

` }) export class IconButtonComponent { }

examples.fullCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CardComponent, CardHeaderComponent, CardTitleComponent, CardContentComponent, CardFooterComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/card.component'; import { ButtonComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/button.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-full-card', imports: [CardComponent, CardHeaderComponent, CardTitleComponent, CardContentComponent, CardFooterComponent, ButtonComponent], template: ` Project Details

Manage your project settings and configuration.
Everything you need to build amazing user interfaces.
Cancel Save ` }) export class FullCardComponent { }
examples.formCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { CardComponent, CardHeaderComponent, CardTitleComponent, CardContentComponent, CardFooterComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/card.component'; import { ButtonComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/button.component'; import { InputComponent } from '../../../../../tolle/src/lib/input.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form-card', imports: [CardComponent, CardHeaderComponent, CardTitleComponent, CardContentComponent, CardFooterComponent, ButtonComponent, InputComponent, FormsModule], template: ` Theme Settings

Derived colors will update as you change the primary.

Pro Tip: This background is auto-generated using color-mix based on your primary color!
Cancel Save Changes ` }) export class FormCardComponent { }

triggerProps.name: tolleContextMenuTrigger
triggerProps.description: The array of menu items to display.

triggerProps.name: (action)
triggerProps.description: Emitted when a menu item is clicked. The payload is the item ID.

itemProps.name: id
itemProps.description: Unique identifier for the item. Optional if separator is true.

itemProps.name: label
itemProps.description: The text to display. Optional if separator is true.

itemProps.name: destructive
itemProps.description: Styles the item with a destructive color (red).

itemProps.name: separator
itemProps.description: If true, renders a separator line instead of an item.

itemProps.name: submenu
itemProps.description: Nested array of items to display in a submenu.

dataTableProps.name: data
dataTableProps.description: The dataset to display in the table.

dataTableProps.name: searchable
dataTableProps.description: If true, shows a search input for filtering data.

dataTableProps.name: paginate
dataTableProps.description: If true, enables pagination for the table.

dataTableProps.name: pageSize
dataTableProps.description: The number of rows per page.

dataTableProps.name: pageSizeOptions
dataTableProps.description: Options for the user to select page size.

dataTableProps.name: allowColumnHiding
dataTableProps.description: If true, allows users to toggle column visibility.

dataTableProps.name: showSettings
dataTableProps.description: If true, shows the settings button (e.g., for column hiding).

dataTableProps.name: expandable
dataTableProps.description: If true, allows rows to be expanded to show more details.

dataTableProps.name: expandedTemplate
dataTableProps.description: The template to render when a row is expanded.

dataTableProps.name: stickyHeader
dataTableProps.description: If true, the table header stays fixed at the top while scrolling.

dataTableProps.name: maxHeight
dataTableProps.description: Sets the maximum height of the table container, enabling vertical scrolling if content exceeds this value.

datePickerProps.description: The selected date value. Supports two-way binding.

datePickerProps.description: Disables the input and prevents popup opening.

datePickerProps.name: formatYearFn

datePickerProps.name: displayFormat

componentProps.description: Whether to visually disable and prevent selection of past dates.

componentProps.name: size
componentProps.description: The size of the input.

componentProps.name: class
componentProps.description: Additional CSS classes for the input.

directiveProps.name: tolleDropdownTrigger

componentProps.name: templateRef

inputProps.name: id
inputProps.description: Unique identifier for the input element. Auto-generated if not provided.

inputProps.name: label
inputProps.description: Text label displayed above the input.

inputProps.name: placeholder
inputProps.description: Placeholder text displayed when input is empty.

inputProps.name: type
inputProps.description: HTML Input type (text, email, password, etc.).

inputProps.name: value
inputProps.description: Current value of the input. Supports bidirectional binding (ngModel).

inputProps.name: hint
inputProps.description: Helper text displayed below the input.

inputProps.name: errorMessage
inputProps.description: Error message displayed when [error] is true.

inputProps.name: error
inputProps.description: Sets the input state to error, changing border color and showing errorMessage if present.

inputProps.name: hideHintOnFocus
inputProps.description: If true, hides the hint text when the input is focused.

inputProps.name: containerClass
inputProps.description: CSS class applied to the input container.

inputProps.name: class
inputProps.description: CSS class applied to the inner input element.

labelProps.name: for
labelProps.description: The id of the form element the label is associated with.

labelProps.name: class
labelProps.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the label.

examples.playgroundCode: ${this.label}
${this.showPrefix ? '\n ' : ''}${this.showSuffix ? '\n ' : ''}

<tolle-multi-select
  [(ngModel)]="selectedValues"${inputs ? '\n  ' + inputs : ''}
>
  <tolle-select-item value="apple">Apple</tolle-select-item>
  <tolle-select-item value="banana">Banana</tolle-select-item>

popoverProps.name: placement

separatorProps.name: decorative

sheetProps.name: isOpen
sheetProps.description: The controlled open state of the sheet.

sheetProps.name: hasBackdrop
sheetProps.description: Whether the sheet has a backdrop.

sheetProps.name: isOpenChange
sheetProps.description: Event emitted when the open state changes.

contentProps.name: side
contentProps.description: The edge of the screen where the component will appear.

contentProps.name: rounded
contentProps.description: Whether the sheet content has rounded corners on its inner side.

serviceProps.description: Opens a sheet with the provided configuration.

configProps.name: content
configProps.description: The content to display (String, Component, or Template).

configProps.name: title

configProps.name: description
configProps.description: Optional description for the standard header.

configProps.name: side
configProps.description: The edge of the screen where the component will appear.

configProps.description: Whether the sheet has a backdrop.

configProps.name: backdropClose
configProps.description: If true, clicking the backdrop closes the sheet.

configProps.name: showCloseButton

configProps.name: rounded
configProps.description: Whether the sheet content has rounded corners on its inner side.

configProps.name: data

configProps.name: context
configProps.description: Context to pass to a TemplateRef content.

configProps.name: class
configProps.description: Additional CSS classes for the sheet content.

examples.usageCode:
<tolle-sheet>
  <tolle-sheet-trigger>Open</tolle-sheet-trigger>
  <tolle-sheet-content>
    <tolle-sheet-header>
      <tolle-sheet-title>Edit profile</tolle-sheet-title>
      <tolle-sheet-description>
        Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.
      </tolle-sheet-description>
    </tolle-sheet-header>
  </tolle-sheet-content>
</tolle-sheet>

serviceProps.description: Determines the color scheme and icon theme.

serviceProps.name: duration
serviceProps.description: Display time in milliseconds before auto-dismissal.

componentProps.name: position
componentProps.description: The fixed quadrant where notifications will accumulate.

toggleProps.name: pressed
toggleProps.description: The pressed state of the toggle.

examples.usageCode:
<tolle-toggle-group type="single">
  <tolle-toggle-group-item value="bold" aria-label="Toggle bold">
    <lucide-icon name="bold" class="h-4 w-4" />
  </tolle-toggle-group-item>
  <tolle-toggle-group-item value="italic" aria-label="Toggle italic">
    <lucide-icon name="italic" class="h-4 w-4" />
  </tolle-toggle-group-item>
  <tolle-toggle-group-item value="underline" aria-label="Toggle underline">
    <lucide-icon name="underline" class="h-4 w-4" />
  </tolle-toggle-group-item>
</tolle-toggle-group>

tooltipProps.name: tolleTooltip
tooltipProps.description: The content to be displayed within the tooltip.

tooltipProps.name: placement
tooltipProps.description: The preferred placement of the tooltip relative to its trigger.

  placement="${this.placement}"

</button>
